application-info.load.file: fr_Load a Application Information Enrolment File
mdsap.number: fr_Medical Device Single Audit Program (MDSAP) Certificate Number
mdsap.org: fr_Medical Device Single Audit Program (MDSAP) Auditing Organization
is.ivdd: fr_Is this device an In Vitro Diagnostic Device (IVDD)?
is.home.use: fr_Is this sold for home use?
is.point.care: fr_Is this device used at a point of care, such as pharmacy, bedside, or healthcare professional's office?
contain.radiation: fr_Do any of the devices contained in this application emit radiation?
contain.drug: fr_Does  this device contain a drug?
have.din.npn: fr_Does the drug have a Drug Identification Number (DIN) or the Natural Product Number (NPN)
fileio.msg.parseFail: fr_Parsing of the file has failed
fileio.msg.dataTypeError: fr_Error: the wrong form data was selected for this form.
heading.standard.list: fr_List of Recognized Standards Complied with in the manufacture of the Device
device.name: fr_Name of Compatible Device
device.authorized: fr_Has this device been authorized by Health Canada?
device.application.submitted: fr_Has an application been previously submitted for this device?
material.name: fr_Name of Material
device.label.name: fr_Name of Device (as it appears on the label)
combination.products.related: fr_For combination products, please complete the information listed below with respect to the drug or drug substance.
drug.name: fr_Brand/Trade Name of Drug
provision.mdr: fr_Has this device been previously authorized for sale in Canada under the following provisions of the Medical Devices Regulations:
standards.list: fr_Recognized Standards Complied with in the manufacture of the Device
conformity.declaration: fr_Declaration of Conformity form (available on the Health Canada website) confirms that the medical device(s) comply with Recognized Standards or equivalent or better standards
declaration.instruct: fr_Health Canada can not process your medical Device Licence Application without the Declaration of Conformity
consist.recombinant: fr_Does this device consist of recombinant material?
contain.material: fr_Does this device contain, or is it produced using, any animal or human sourced material?
is.same.material: fr_Is the biological material the same for all devices listed in the device details table?
error.mgs.company.id: fr_Please specify a valid company ID.
error.mgs.dossier.id: fr_Please specify a valid dossier ID.
error.mgs.din: fr_Please specify a valid Drug Identification Number (DIN).
error.mgs.npn: fr_Please specify a valid Natural Product Number (NPN).
error.mgs.licence.number: fr_Please specify a valid Licence Number.
error.mgs.application.number: fr_Please specify a valid application number.
error.msg.contact.one.record: fr_At least one biological material attribute should be entered
msg.err.jsonparse: fr_There was an error parsing the working file.
msg.err.xmlparse: fr_There was an error parsing the draft XML file.
msg.err.file.load: fr_There was a problem loading the file.
msg.err.file.type: fr_An invalid file type was selected.
msg.err.form.type: fr_The wrong form type was selected for this form.
msg.err.checksum.fail: fr_The checksum in the file does not match the calculated checksum
instruction.help: fr_Instructions for completing sections on form
section.show.option: fr_[ This section may not be visible.]
help.file.load_1: fr_A file should not be loaded if it is the initial enrolment for the Dossier.
help.file.load_2: fr_When continuing with a working copy, the format of the file to load should be .hcsc.
help.file.load_3: fr_When viewing a draft or final XML file, the format of the file to load should be .xml.
help.app.info_1: fr_The Manufacturer Company Identifier must be obtained from the final company XML file, issued by Health Canada.
help.app.info_2: fr_The Dossier Identifier can be obtained from the final dossier XML file or other Health Canada issued document. (e.g. HC6-024-m178974).
help.mdsap.number: fr_For New and Amendment Private Label Licence Applications, please provide the MDSAP Certificate number for the medical device manufactured by the original manufacturer.
help.lic.app.type_2: fr_Guidance for the Interpretation of Sections 28 to 31: Licence Application Type
help.mdsap.org: fr_For New and Amendment Private Label Licence Applicatons, please select “Not Applicable”.
help.device.class_2: fr_Guidance Document - Guidance on the Risk-based Classification System for Non-In Vitro Diagnostic Devices (non-IVDDs)
